The XXI Century

February 2010

Scientists will discover the hidden pattern behind everything you do.

Meantime on the internet you'll share everything you think you do.

Instead of making Power transparent you will become all visible to them.

Augmented reality will be the next simulacra in which all you do and planning to do will be under total control by others.

You won’t change as times are changing. You’ll just blindly enjoy technology.

You'll work 1 hour/day. You'll play the next seven. The new reality will make sure you are just a doll resting in peace.

This story is about transparency. With focus on augmented reality, simulacra, control.
